title: Front End Developer
description: Plan and perform failure analysis of electronic control units (ECUs) after design validation (DV) testing;Make physical assessment of ECUs regarding ageing and damaging of all relevant components, their assembly and interconnect technologies;Judge ageing indicators with respect to lifetime requirements based on material science knowledge;Improve and adapt methods of analysis as required by new products/technologies;Devise and initiate experiments for the investigation of failure, ageing mechanisms and their indicators;

university: Technical University of Cluj-Napoca, Faculty of Constuctions
